title: Public transport for Post Malone World Tour concert: Thursday 30 November 2023
articleContent:
Public transport for Post Malone World Tour concert: Thursday 30 November 2023

Events > Music

The Grammy Award winning phenomenon returns in November for his show under the stars in Melbourne. Don't miss Post Malone's massive summer tour! Public transport is helping people get to the Melbourne Showgrounds on Thursday 30 November 2023.

Doors open: 5:00pm

Before you travel

Plan your journey using Journey planner and check Disruptions for service changes that may affect your journey.

 Metropolitan train

Getting to the Melbourne Showgrounds

Train services will operate from Flinders Street Station (Platform 9) to Melbourne Showgrounds, stopping at Southern Cross Station (Platform 14), North Melbourne (Platform 6), and then to Melbourne Showgrounds (Platform 1).

The first train is to depart Flinders Street Station at:

  • 5:00pm until 8:14pm every 15 minutes

Leaving the Melbourne Showgrounds

Train services will operate from Melbourne Showgrounds (Platform 1) to Flinders Street Station, stopping at North Melbourne (Platform 5), Southern Cross Station (Platform 13) and then into Flinders Street (Platform 10).

Trains to depart from:

  • 5:21pm to 8:36pm every 15 minutes
  • 10:00pm to 10:45pm every 15 minutes
  • 10:45pm to 11:45pm every 5-7 minutes

Plan your journey using Journey planner.

 Metropolitan tram

Getting to and from the Melbourne Showgrounds

Passengers can catch a Route 57 tram, alighting at Stop 32 Sandown Road/Epsom Road.

Plan your journey using Journey planner.

 Metropolitan bus

Getting to and from the Racecourse

No additional services will operate. All services will run to a normal weekend timetable.

The following bus route travels close to the Melbourne Showgrounds:

  • Route 404 (Footscray - Moonee Ponds via Newmarket)

Plan your journey using Journey planner.

 Regional train

Getting to the Melbourne Showgrounds

Passengers arriving at North Melbourne and Southern Cross stations are advised to change trains and catch a Melbourne Showgrounds service.

  • Arriving at Southern Cross Station, change to Platform 14 and catch a Melbourne Showgrounds service
  • Arriving at North Melbourne Station, change to Platform 6 and catch a Melbourne Showgrounds service

Refer to the Metropolitan trains section above for service times and platform information.

Leaving the Melbourne Showgrounds

Passengers are advised to catch any train from the Melbourne Showgrounds and travel to Southern Cross or North Melbourne stations and change to a regional train.

Refer to the Metropolitan train section above for service times.

Plan your journey using Journey planner.
